work_experience.description: Developed a native Android application for seamless video conferencing. Integrated the app with existing website functionalities. At HyperVerge (possible error, should be Svirtz Technologies), designed and optimized client onboarding workflows, ensuring seamless integration and scalability for enterprise solutions. projects.name: Dimensionality Reduction using Metaheuristic Algorithms
projects.description: Developed a dimensionality reduction approach using metaheuristic algorithms to optimize feature selection in high-dimensional datasets. By leveraging techniques like Genetic Algorithms and Particle Swarm Optimization, improved computational efficiency while retaining essential data patterns for better machine learning performance.
